title: The Fury Midnight
description: Soundtrack for epic cinematic boss fights
longDescription:
The Fury Midnight is all the material I made while doing the Soulstober 2022 prompts. This year I went for even more dramatic and cinematic. Something something lessons learned from last year.Â Some of this was composed during October and some was composed at some point after haha.


Listen to the whole thing before you buy
